message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I think this is fair.
Alice, I think we can find something more agreeable.  How about this?
Bob, this is already costing us both.  I'm willing to compromise, but it needs to be fair. This offer reflects the time-value of our money.
Alice, we're running out of time here.  This offer is the best I can do considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.  We both lose if this goes on any longer.
